p.k: When Bubbles gets a bad school photo, it sends her into an existential tailspin... of darkness. / When Blossom and Bubbles get sick, Buttercup volunteers to take care of them for the day. / After finding a baby monster in the park, Bubbles insists on adopting it without considering the consequences! / When the Fashionistas launch a new line of brainwashing clothing, it’s up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop the fashion trend before it’s too late.
